briefTitle: NEXUS Study for the Treatment of de Novo Native Coronary Artery Lesions

interventionNames: Device: CYPHER NxT SES ON BX SONIC OTW STENT DELIVERY SYSTEM (SDS)

interventions.name: CYPHER NxT SES ON BX SONIC OTW STENT DELIVERY SYSTEM (SDS)

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved Procedure Success From Post-procedure to Hospital Discharge
outcomeMeasures.description: Procedure Success is defined as the final residual diameter stenosis \< 50 percent by Quantitative Coronary Angiography (QCA) using any percutaneous method, without the occurrence of death, Myocardial Infarction (MI), or repeat revascularization of the target lesion

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants Who Experienced Any Major Adverse Cardiac Events From Post-procedure to 30 Days Later
outcomeMeasures.description: Major Adverse Cardiac Events (MACE) consists of death, Myocardial Infarction (Q-wave and Non Q-wave), emergent Coronary Artery Bypass Graft (CABG) or Target Lesion Revascularization (TLR).

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants Who Experienced Any Major Adverse Cardiac Events From Post-procedure to Hospital Discharge
outcomeMeasures.description: Major Adverse Cardiac Events (MACE) consists of death, Myocardial Infarction (Q-wave and Non Q-wave), emergent Coronary Artery Bypass Graft (CABG) or Target Lesion Revascularization (TLR).

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants Who Experienced Any Major Adverse Cardiac Events From Post-procedure to 12 Months Later
outcomeMeasures.description: Major Adverse Cardiac Events (MACE) consists of death, Myocardial Infarction (Q-wave and Non Q-wave), emergent Coronary Artery Bypass Graft (CABG) or Target Lesion Revascularization (TLR).

commonTop: Myocardial Infarction (Q wave or Non-Q wave)
